about_the_game:
Advent of the Reaper is a retro-inspired, dark fantasy tactics RPG about Reapers, Angels, the pasts they left behind, and the fate of their world! Follow Elira, a newly summoned Reaper, as she unravels a dark plot threatening the realm. Brandish your scythe as you enter a dangerous world filled with the cruelty of humanity, the righteous indignation of the Angels, and some horrors as ancient and maligned as the Reapers themselves.

  • Exciting Tactics Gameplay - Designed by a tiny team of lifetime fans of the tactics RPG genre, Advent aims to provide players a thrilling, high-stakes series of battles where action selection and sequencing are critical to finding a path to victory!

  • Retro Style Pixel Art - Inspired by the greats of yesteryear, the game pools the talent of several pixel artists to deliver a beautiful and nostalgic pixel art experience reminiscent of the SNES and GBA eras!

  • A Dark Tale for the Ages - Designed top-down from a painstakingly crafted and delicately woven plot, Advent invites players to lose themselves in its expansive lore and rich cast of characters delivered in Visual Novel style scenes.

Advent of the Reaper is a small but mighty indie effort. We do not have a release date to to share at this time - we are hard at work preparing a demo for players to dip their toes into the Advent experience as development continues on the game.
